about_the_game:
Join Piccadilly and her delightful friends on an enchanting journey through a museum unlike any other. Get ready to immerse yourself in a world of wonder, creativity, and jigsaw puzzles!

🎨 A Gallery of Imagination 🎨
Step into the captivating world of "Piccadilly and her Magical World" Children's Picture Book Series. Explore a museum bursting with art, characters, and captions straight from the heartwarming pages of this award-winning series. Every puzzle piece tells a story, inviting you to embark on an artistic adventure like no other.

🎵 A Symphony of Sound 🎵
Feel the magic of Piccadilly's Puzzle Museum come to life with an original full-length soundtrack. Immerse yourself in a symphony of melodies that complement the beauty of each puzzle, creating an enchanting atmosphere that will transport you to a world of imagination and wonder.

🧩 48 Puzzles, Countless Challenges 🧩
Get ready to test your wits and unleash your inner puzzle enthusiast! Piccadilly's Puzzle Museum offers 48 crafted puzzles based on 12 different full-color illustrations. Each puzzle comes in four difficulty levels, ensuring there's a challenge for everyone. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned puzzler, you'll find the perfect level to suit your skills.

🌟 Hours of Joyful Exploration 🌟
Get lost in the mesmerizing world of puzzles with Piccadilly and her friends. Spend hours of delightful exploration as you piece together these stunning illustrations. From whimsical characters to breathtaking landscapes, each puzzle is a work of art waiting for you to uncover its secrets.

🛍️ No Hidden Costs, No Limits 🛍️
We believe in providing an exceptional gaming experience without any strings attached. With Piccadilly's Puzzle Museum, there are no additional purchases required to complete the entire museum. Enjoy all the puzzles and features to your heart's content, without any interruptions.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or beyond
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or beyond; 256 MB or above
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6 (Snow Leopard)
  • Processor: 2.0+ GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Most Built-in Graphics Cards
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Piccadilly's Puzzle Museum

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 - 2.2GHz or beyond
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 240 / Radeon HD 657
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Join Piccadilly and her friends today and unlock the magic of Piccadilly's Puzzle Museum. Dive into a world where imagination knows no bounds, and every puzzle piece is a piece of art waiting to be discovered. Are you ready to embark on this delightful puzzle adventure?
